entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 3:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
